content: /Tmariyaam paranyathentennaal / ente dehi kartthaavine pukazhtthunnu / ente aathmaavu enne jeevippikkunnavanaaya daivatthil santoshichu / entennaal avan thante daasiyude thaazhmaye nokkikkandirikkunnu / kandaalum ithumuthal sakala vamshangallum enikku bhaagyam tharum.
/tentennaal shakthimaanum parishuddhanum aayavan / valiya kaaryangall engkal pravartthichirikkunnu / avante karuna avane bhayappedunnavarudemel / thalamurakallaayum vamshangallaayum undaakunnu.

/tavan thante bhujamkondu jayam undaakki / hrdayavichaaratthil ahangkaarikallaayavare chhinnippichu / avan balavaanmaare simhaasanangallilninnu marichidukayum / thaazhmayullllavare uyartthukayum cheythu.

/tavan vishappullllavare nanmakallkondu sampoornnaraakkukayum / sampannare vyarththhamaayi ayaykkukayum cheythu / thante daasanaaya israayeline sahaayikkukayum / avan nammude pithaakkanmaaraaya abrahaaminodum / avante santathiyodum samsaarichaprakaaram / ennekkum thante karunaye orkkukayumcheythu.
